Source.Name: libnl
Source.Summary: a collection of libraries providing APIs to netlink protocol based Linux kernel interfaces.
Source.Description: Netlink is a IPC mechanism primarly between the kernel and user space processes. It was designed to be a more flexible successor to ioctl to provide mainly networking related kernel configuration and monitoring interfaces.

Package.Name: libnl
Package.Summary: a collection of libraries providing APIs to netlink protocol based Linux kernel interfaces.
Package.Description: Netlink is a IPC mechanism primarly between the kernel and user space processes. It was designed to be a more flexible successor to ioctl to provide mainly networking related kernel configuration and monitoring interfaces.
